long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lichess Enhanced Player Stats is an extension designed to help chess enthusiasts gain insights into their opponent's statistics directly on the Lichess platform. This extension fetches and displays a user's chess performance data, providing you with a competitive edge to strategize your gameplay.

Here are the features:

Winning Ratio: Understand your opponent's performance by viewing their win percentage.
Performance Progress: Track the progress score of the player's rapid performance, a positive score indicates improvement.
Average Opponent Rating: Get to know the average rating of the opponents the user has played against.
Best Win: Learn about the highest-rated opponent the player has defeated.
Recent Rapid Results: See the most recent win/loss/draw results in rapid games.
To use this extension, simply install it, and navigate to any live or completed chess game on Lichess. The player statistics will be seamlessly integrated into the existing user interface, next to the player's name and rating. No further configuration or interaction is needed.

Lichess Enhanced Player Stats helps bring your chess analysis and strategy planning to the next level. Download now and start improving your game!
